thread.section_title: Airtasker Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Airtasker | www.airtasker.com
thread.title: Glenn Leishman

author: Glenn Leishman
title: Glenn Leishman
text:
I run a small engineering consultancy and with most medium to large companies now paying 60-90 days (an unfair situation), I was forced to downsize the business. I intend to use airtasker to get all sorts of things done from CAD work, maintenance, delivery and general labour work.
Now I can get jobs done, keep my charge rates competitive and stay in business.
